data.convo: When were you born may I ask ? On 20th May 1963 . Do you know what it was according to the lunar calendar ? 27th day of the fourth month . By the way , could you tell me when the film will begin ? It will begin at five thirty . I am frigid I can't be there on time . You can see it tomorrow . I don't want to miss it today . See you . See you .
